category.name: Product Structure.RDV
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_set_default_3DBox_dimensions
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default option for 3D box dimensions. It applies to spatial searches. It applies to spatial searches in the Structure Manager, Multi Structure Manager, and Manufacturing Process Planner applications. Valid Values: 0 - Centroid and size. 1 - Origin and size. 2 - Maximum and minimum extents.
